Html:
Hello,

For my mobile project, I use Xamarin and MvvmLight.

For Windows Phone, I used to use the converters.

My question is that it is the equivalent on Android and iOS

Thank you
Mohamed

Hi,

The IValueConverter interface might cause you issues as it doesn't seem to be available on Xamarin.

That said, if you have conversion logic, you can leverage it using the Binding.ConvertSourceToTarget and Binding.ConvertTargetToSource methods. Since the SetBinding method returns a Binding instance, you can just call these methods there.

Cheers
Laurent
